  • Class
    Description
    GuiDefaultInits
    the dummy class for obtaining the default instance of GuiInits
    GuiInitAction
    initial settings for actions: it can enables confirmation dialog before execution
    GuiInitNumberSpinner
    @GuiIncluded @GuiInits(numberSpinner = @GuiInitNumberSpinner(format="#,##0.0")) //the annotation can specify the number format of the spinner; e.g.
    GuiInitSplitPane
    initial settings for split-pane: determines the default component orientation of the attached type
    GuiInitTabbedPane
    initial settings for tabbled-pane: determines the pane of the attached type becomes tab or not.
    GuiInitTable
    initial settings for table : determines the initial row-height for the table of the attached type
    GuiInitTableColumn
    initial settings for any type of table columns
    GuiInitTableColumnString
    initial settings for a column of string
    GuiInitWindow
    initial settings for window : determines the initial size of the window of the attached type
